Title: Jeffrey F. Naughton
Body: (1) Techniques for improving the performance of multi-dimensional data analysis, including array-based storage and processing algorithms, bit-map indices, and algorithms for computing the "cube"; (2) The performance of object-relational database systems, including benchmarking O/R DBMS, algorithms for set-valued attributes, and techniques for parallelizing O/R workloads; (3) Parallel geo-spatial information systems.
